name: ts-sdk-client-generator
description: Generate TypeScript API clients from OpenAPI specifications using ts-sdk-client

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist generated coverage && find src -name '*.js' -o -name '*.js.map' -o -name '*.d.ts' | xargs rm -f
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:integration && npm run test:functional
scripts.test:advanced: npm run build && npm run test:all
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:functional && npm run test:openapi-versions
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean:build && npm run test:all
